public class Hand extends Object implements Comparable<Hand>
Represents a player's hand.

      private int compareHighCard(Hand h)
      Compares this hand with another hand h.
      Parameters:
      h - Hand to compare with.
      Returns:
      positive number if this hand is better than h, negative number if this hand is worse than h, 0 if this hand is equal to h.

    • compareHigherRank

      private int compareHigherRank(Hand h)
      Compares significant higher rank of this hand with significant higher rank of h.
      Parameters:
      h - Hand to compare with.
      Returns:
      positive number if this hand is better than h (according to significant higher rank), negative number if this hand is worse than h, 0 if this hand is equal to h.
